rules.summary: The A allele at rs4244285 (CYP2C19*2) is associated with reduced enzyme function in clinical guidelines.
GG at rs4244285 is not associated with the reduced-function CYP2C19*2 allele.
The T allele at rs12248560 (CYP2C19*17) is associated with increased enzyme function in clinical guidelines.
CC at rs12248560 is not associated with the increased-function CYP2C19*17 allele.

default_summary: No call or unrecognized genotype for CYP2C19 markers.
suggestion: If you take medications affected by CYP2C19 (e.g., clopidogrel, some antidepressants or PPIs), discuss with a clinician. Do not change medications based on this app.

evidence_level.summary: CPIC guidelines exist, but full metabolizer status requires clinical-grade testing across multiple variants.

limitations: SNP-chip data do not capture all CYP2C19 variants. This is not a clinical test or prescribing guidance.
